mapper.select: SELECT T1.ID AS ID , T1.MST_CORPNAME AS MST_CORPNAME , T1.MST_PARTNAME AS MST_PARTNAME , T1.MST_CREATE_USER AS MST_CREATE_USER , T1.MST_ADMIN_USER AS MST_ADMIN_USER , T1.MST_REGISTERED AS MST_REGISTERED , T1.MST_STATUS AS MST_STATUS , T1.MST_PASSWORD AS MST_PASSWORD , T1.MST_ADMINPWD AS MST_ADMINPWD , T1.MST_READPWD AS MST_READPWD , T1.MST_ACCESS AS MST_ACCESS , (SELECT COUNT(SVY_FID) FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO T2 WHERE T2.MST_ID = T1.ID) AS TOTCNT FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_CNRSSPCE T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.ID = #{id}

SELECT SVY_LABEL AS ID , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(SVY_DATA,5186),4326), 'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',2) AS LON , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(SVY_DATA,5186),4326), 'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',1) AS LAT , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' AS SN , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->2->>'VALUE' AS SD , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->3->>'VALUE' AS SGG , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' AS EMD , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' AS RI , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' AS JIBUN , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' AS REGION1 , REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->8->>'VALUE','취약지역 해제조사|\(|\)','','g') AS TYPE , GID AS SMID FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO WHERE 1=1
AND MST_ID = CAST(#{mst_id} AS INT)
AND GID = CAST(#{smid} AS INT)
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{svyid},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->2->>'VALUE' = (SELECT CTPRVN_NM FROM TF_FEIS_CTPRVN WHERE CTPRVN_COD = #{sd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->3->>'VALUE' = (SELECT SIGNGU_NM FROM TF_FEIS_SIGNGU WHERE SIGNGU_COD = #{sgg})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' = (SELECT EMD_NM FROM TF_FEIS_EMD WHERE EMD_CODE = #{emd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' = (SELECT LI_NM FROM TF_FEIS_LI WHERE LI_CODE = #{ri})
ORDER BY GID ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) TOTCNT FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO WHERE 1=1 AND MST_ID = CAST(#{mst_id} AS INT)
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{svyid},'%')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' = (SELECT CTPRVN_NM FROM TF_FEIS_CTPRVN WHERE CTPRVN_COD = #{sd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' = (SELECT SIGNGU_NM FROM TF_FEIS_SIGNGU WHERE SIGNGU_COD = #{sgg})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' = (SELECT EMD_NM FROM TF_FEIS_EMD WHERE EMD_CODE = #{emd})
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' = (SELECT LI_NM FROM TF_FEIS_LI WHERE LI_CODE = #{ri})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_CNRSSPCE WHERE ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO WHERE MST_ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_SVYCOMPT WHERE MST_ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
mapper.select: SELECT T1.SVY_LABEL AS ID , REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->8->>'VALUE','취약지역 해제조사|\(|\)','','g') AS TYPE , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(T1.SVY_DATA,5186),4326), 'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',2) AS LON , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(T1.SVY_DATA,5186),4326), 'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',1) AS LAT , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->2->>'VALUE' AS SD , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->3->>'VALUE' AS SGG , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' AS EMD , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' AS RI , REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' AS JIBUN , (COALESCE(NULLIF(REPLACE(T2.SVY_MEMO ,'\\','\'),''),'{}'))::JSON->>'완료' AS AT FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_FEIS_CNL_SVYCOMPT T2 ON T1.MST_ID = T2.MST_ID AND T1.SVY_LABEL = T2.SVY_LABEL WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MST_ID = CAST(#{mst_id} AS INT)
SELECT DISTINCT SPLIT_PART((SPLIT_PART(MST_REGISTERED, ' ',1)),'/',1) AS svyYear FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_CNRSSPCE ORDER BY svyYear DESC
SELECT COUNT(MST_PARTNAME) FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_CNRSSPCE WHERE MST_PARTNAME=#{MST_PARTNAME}

SELECT SVY_LABEL AS SVY_ID , GID AS SMID , MST_ID AS MST_ID , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(SVY_DATA,5186),4326) ,'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',2) AS SVY_LON , SPLIT_PART(ST_ASLATLONTEXT(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_GEOMFROMTEXT(SVY_DATA,5186),4326) ,'D°M''SS.SS"C'),' ',1) AS SVY_LAT , COALESCE(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') AS CREATEDT , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지정사유', '') AS APPNRESN , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'사업종가능', '') AS WEAKAPPNBSTYPE , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'구역설정', '') AS WEAKAPPNAREASET , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'선정사유', '') AS WEAKAPPNSLTNHY , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지정번호', '') AS APPNNO , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'당시현황', '') AS WEAKAPPNSTTUS , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'당시종합의견', '') AS WEAKAPPNMSTOPN , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지정년도', '') AS APPNYEAR , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'지정면적', '') AS APPNAREA , COALESCE(SVY_MEMO::JSON->>'가능여부', '') AS WEAKAPPNPOSYN , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->0->>'VALUE' AS SN , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->2->>'VALUE' AS SVY_SD , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->3->>'VALUE' AS SVY_SGG , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->4->>'VALUE' AS SVY_EMD , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->5->>'VALUE' AS SVY_RI , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->6->>'VALUE' AS SVY_JIBUN , REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->7->>'VALUE' AS REGION1 , REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(SVY_ATTR,'\\\\"\\\\" N"|\\\\"\\\\" E"|\d""','\""','g')::JSON->8->>'VALUE','취약지역 해제조사|\(|\)','','g') AS SVY_TYPE FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO WHERE 1=1 AND GID = CAST(#{smid} AS INT)

SELECT
ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{bpx}::FLOAT, #{bpy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS BPX , ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{bpx}::FLOAT, #{bpy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS BPY
,
ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{epx}::FLOAT, #{epy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS EPX , ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_SETSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{epx}::FLOAT, #{epy}::FLOAT),4326),5186)) AS EPY
mapper.update:
UPDATE TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO SET LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = NOW() , SVY_MEMO = (COALESCE(NULLIF(REPLACE(SVY_MEMO,'\\','\'),''),'{}'))::JSONB || CONCAT('{'
,CONCAT('"지정사유" : "',#{appnResn},'",')
,CONCAT('"사업종가능" : "',#{weakAppnBsType},'",')
,CONCAT('"구역설정" : "',#{weakAppnAreaSet},'",')
,CONCAT('"선정사유" : "',#{weakAppnSltnHy},'",')
,CONCAT('"지정번호" : "',#{appnNo},'",')
,CONCAT('"당시현황" : "',#{weakAppnSttus},'",')
,CONCAT('"당시종합의견" : "',#{weakAppnMstOpn},'",')
,CONCAT('"지정년도" : "',#{appnYear},'",')
,CONCAT('"지정면적" : "',#{appnArea},'",')
,CONCAT('"가능여부" : "',#{weakAppnPosYn},'"')
,'}')::JSONB
, SVY_KEYWORD = #{svyId} , SVY_LABEL = #{svyId}
, SVY_LON = #{svyLon}::FLOAT
, SVY_LAT = #{svyLat}::FLOAT
, SVY_DATA = ST_ASTEXT(ST_SetSRID(ST_MAKEPOINT(#{svyLon}::FLOAT, #{svyLat}::FLOAT), 5186))
, SVY_ATTR = #{svy_attr}
WHERE GID = CAST(#{smid} AS INTEGER)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_CNL_FIELDINFO WHERE GID = CAST(#{smid} AS INTEGER)
mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_ID , DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' ORDER BY DEPT_ID ASC

SELECT A.DEPT_ID , A.DEPT_NM , B.MBER_NM , B.ESNTL_ID FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO A, TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER B WHERE A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND A.ORGNZT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' AND B.MBER_STTUS = 'P'
AND (A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR B.MBER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND A.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND B.MBER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID ASC

SELECT A.ESNTL_ID AS ESNTL_ID , A.MST_ID AS ID , A.USER_GRADE AS USER_GRADE , C.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM , B.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM FROM TN_FEIS_CNRSSPCE_AUTHORMGT A, TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER B, TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO C WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID AND B.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_ID AND B.MBER_STTUS = 'P'
AND A.MST_ID = CAST(#{id} AS INT)
ORDER BY C.DEPT_ID ASC, B.MBER_NM ASC
SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(DEPT_ID,'[^[:digit:]]','','g') AS DEPT_ID , DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' AND DEPT_ID != 'DEPT_0000009000000' ORDER BY DEPT_ID

SELECT A.MBER_ID AS MBER_ID , A.ESNTL_ID AS ESNTL_ID , A.MBER_NM AS MBER_NM , A.OFCPS_NM AS OFCPS_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.DEPT_ID,'[^[:digit:]]','','g') AS DEPT_ID , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_DEPTINFO B WHERE B.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID) DEPT_NM FROM TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER A WHERE A.INSTT_ID = 'ORGNZT_0000000000000' AND A.MBER_STTUS = 'P' ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID, ARRAY_POSITION(ARRAY['사무처장','연구조사처장','지부장','부장','차장','과장','대리','사원','계약직'],A.OFCPS_NM::TEXT)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TN_FEIS_CNRSSPCE_AUTHORMGT WHERE USER_GRADE != 'ADMIN' AND MST_ID = CAST(#{id} as INT)
